Citation_Information.description: This document provides a comprehensive description of the $MISSION_NAME SPICE kernel archive containing observation geometry and other ancillary data in the form of SPICE System kernel files for the $PDS4_OBSERVER_NAME instruments and targets. It describes the archive directory structure, kernels included in the archive, their naming conventions, and provides pointers to the SPICE software and documentation.
